    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initializes the Parser and the RadioRecommenderSystem. Asks for user input through the console afterwards. Should keep asking for input indefinitely. The user can input the following commands: similarsong - Finds the most similar song to the chosen song. stats - Prints statistics of the chosen song. recommend - Recommends a song to the chosen station. similarradio - Finds the most similar radio station to the chosen station. exit - Exits the program.
        Parameters:
        args - The first argument should contain the folder path for the three files.

      • closestSong

        public int closestSong(int songID)
        Returns the song which is most similar to the song with the corresponding songID. In the case of a tie, return the song with the lowest ID.
        Parameters:
        songID - ID of the original song
        Returns:
        -1 if the given songID is invalid -2 if there are not enough songs otherwise the ID of the most similar song

      • songSimilarity

        public double songSimilarity(Song s1,
                    Song s2)
        Computes the similarity of two given songs
        Parameters:
        s1 - First song
        s2 - Second song
        Returns:
        Double representing the similarity between the songs

      • closestStation

        public int closestStation(int radioID)
        Returns the station which is most similar to the station with the corresponding radioID. In the case of a tie, return the station with the lowest ID.
        Parameters:
        radioID - ID of the original radio station
        Returns:
        -1 if the given radioID is invalid -2 if there are not enough stations otherwise the ID of the most similar station

      • stationSimilarity

        public double stationSimilarity(Station s1,
                       Station s2)
        Computes the similarity of two given stations
        Parameters:
        s1 - First station
        s2 - Second station
        Returns:
        Double representing the similarity between the stations

      • bestRecommendation

        public int bestRecommendation(int radioID)
        Gets the song with the highest recommendation for the given station that isn't already played by the station.
        Parameters:
        radioID - ID of the station for which we want a recommendation.
        Returns:
        -1 if the given radioID is invalid -2 if there are not enough stations to make a recommendation -3 if there are not enough songs to make a recommendation otherwise the ID of the most highly recommended song for this station

      • makeRecommendation

        public double makeRecommendation(int recSongID,
                        int radioID)
        Computes the recommendation of a given song to a particular radio station
        Parameters:
        recSongID - Recommended song ID
        radioID - ID of station being recommended to
        Returns:
        Value indicating how highly recommended is the song
